/*
	Guia_03
	806454 - Yago Almeida Melo
*/

1a.)
a.) 1001 (2) = 001001 = C1,6 - 110110 (2)
b.) 1100 (2) = 00001100 = C1,8 - 11110100 (2)
c.) 101101 (2) = 010010 + 1 = C2,6 010011 (2)
d.) 100111 (2) = 1011000 + 1 = C2,7 1011001 (2)  
e.) 110001 (2) = 00110001 + 1 = C2,8 00110010 (2)

2a.) 
a.) 312 (4) = [11][01][10] (2) = C1,6 - 001001 (2)
b.) 5F (16) = [0101][1111] (2) = 01011111 = C1,8 - 10100000 (2)
c.) 123 (4) = [01][10][11] (2) = 100100 + 1 = C2,6 - 100101 (2)
d.) 147 (8) = [0001][100][111] = 1110011000 + 1 = C2,10 - 1110011001 (2)
e.) D5 (16) = [1101][0101] = 00101010 + 1 = C2,8 - 00101011 (2)

3a.)
a.) 1_0101 (2) = 0_1011 (2) = +11 (10) 
b.) 1_10011 (2) = 0_01101 (2) = +13 (10)
c.) 1_00111 (2) = 0_11001 (2) = +11001 (2)
d.) 1_011011 (2) = 0_100101 (2) = +100101 (2)
e.) 1_010001 (2) = 0_101111 (2) = [0010][1110] = +2F (16)

4a.)									
a.) 11100 (2) - 01101 (2) = 11100 + 10011 = 01111 (2) 		        		
b.) 101,0111 (2) - 010,1100 (2) = 1010111-0101100 = 1010111 + 1010100 = 1_010,1011 (2)
c.) 231 (4) - 132 (4) = 101101 - 011110 = 101101 + 100010 = 1_001111 (2) = 33 (4)
d.) 513 (8) - 173 (8) = 101001011 - 001111011 = 101001011 + 110000101 = 1_011010000 = 320 (8) 
e.) 8B3 (16) - C4F (16) = 100010110011 - 110001001111 = 100010110011 + 001110110001 = 110001100100 (2) = C64 (16)

5a.)
a.) 101011 (2) - 001110 (2) = 101011 + 110010 = 1_011101 (2) = 00011101 (2) 
b.) 101,1011 (2) - 2,4 (8) = 101,1011 + 010,0100 (2) = 101,1011 + 101,1100 = 1_011,0111 = 011,0111 (2)
c.) 312 (4) - D (16) = 011001010 - 00001101 = 11001010 + 11110011 = 1_10111101 = 10111101 (2)
d.) C3 (16) - 1011001 (2) = 11000011 - 01011001 = 11000011 + 10100111 = 1_01101010 = 01101010 (2)
e.) 51 (10) - 2D (16)  = 00110011 - 00101101 = 00110011 + 11010011 = 1_00000110 = 00000110 (2)
